A resolution recognizing the importance of substance abuse disorder treatment and recovery in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Recognizes the importance of National Alcohol and Drug Addiction Recovery Month.
Affirms the continued need to support substance use education, treatment, and research.
Honors the achievements of individuals who are in recovery from substance use disorders.
